name: FHIR_pqcmc_fda
title: Pharmaceutical Quality - Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls (PQ-CMC) Submissions to FDA
publisher: HL7 International / Biomedical Research and Regulation

contact.name: HL7 International / Biomedical Research and Regulation

description: The FDA PQ-CMC FHIR IG is for submission of structured and standardized information regarding drug product quality, chemistry, manufacturing and processes controls.Â  This data is intended for submission to the US FDA by biopharmaceutical companies for the purpose of drug application review.

resource.name: 3.2.P.1.0 Bundle
resource.description: Description and Composition of the Drug Product bundle

resource.name: 3.2.P.3.2 Bundle for liquid
resource.description: Batch Formula bundle for a liquid drug product

resource.name: 3.2.P.3.2 Bundle for two-layer tablet
resource.description: Batch Formula bundle for a tablet drug product with two layers

resource.name: 3.2.P.4 Bundle
resource.description: Specification bundle for an Excipient substance

resource.name: 3.2.P.5.1 Bundle
resource.description: Specification bundle for a Drug Product

resource.name: 3.2.P.5.5 Bundle
resource.description: Product Characterisation of Impurities bundle

resource.name: 3.2.P.5.5 Bundle 2
resource.description: Product Characterisation of Impurities bundle - example 2

resource.name: 3.2.S.1 Bundle
resource.description: General Information bundle

resource.name: 3.2.S.2.3 Bundle
resource.description: Control of Materials bundle

resource.name: 3.2.S.3 Bundle
resource.description: Substance Characterisation bundle

resource.name: 3.2.S.4.1 Bundle
resource.description: Specification bundle for an API substance

resource.name: Additional Information
resource.description: Any additional information that that the submitter wishes to provide to the FDA that is not structured in the IG. The content of the information submitted via Additional Information may be analyzed at some point in the future, to identify candidate elements for structuring in future iterations of the IG.

resource.name: Amount Ratio
resource.description: The fields needed to represent an amount as a ratio.

resource.name: Analysis Graphic
resource.description: Any attached file that contains a graphical representation

resource.name: Analytical Instrument Data
resource.description: Any attached file that contains analytical instrument data

resource.name: Analytical Instrument Data File Types
resource.description: The acceptable file types that can be used in Analytical Instrument Data Files

resource.name: Attached Document (PDF)
resource.description: An attached PDF file

resource.name: Basic Organization
resource.description: A profile for the data elements required to identify the sponsor and/or the supplier of the drug products or substances.

resource.name: Batch Formula Drug Product Identification
resource.description: The Drug Product produced by the batch formula.

resource.name: Batch utilization Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to batch utilization in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Capsule Shell Classification  Terminology
resource.description: A category of terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to the classification of a capsule in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Chemical Structure Data File Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to chemical structure data file types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Closure Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to closure types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: CMC eCTD 32P10 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD 32P1 profiles (Description and Composition of the Drug Product).

resource.name: CMC eCTD 32P32 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD 32P32 profiles (Product Batch Formula).

resource.name: CMC eCTD 32P55 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD 32P55 profile (Product Characterisation of Impurities).

resource.name: CMC eCTD 32S10 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD 32S1 profiles (General Information).

resource.name: CMC eCTD 32S23 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD 32S23 profiles (Substance Control of Materials).

resource.name: CMC eCTD 32S3 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD 32S3 profiles (Substance Characterisation).

resource.name: CMC eCTD SP4151 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD SP4151 profiles (Specification).

resource.name: Coating Purpose Terminology
resource.description: A category of terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to the coating purpose in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Component Substance
resource.description: Any raw material intended for use in the manufacture of a drug substance, or any ingredient intended for use in the manufacture of a drug product including those that may not appear in such drug product.

resource.name: Container Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to container types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: ContainerClosure
resource.description: Container Closure for drug product referred to in Drug Product Description.

resource.name: Document Reference Attachment
resource.description: A profile that represents the document or diagram in base64.

resource.name: Drug Product Batch Formula
resource.description: Listing of all components of the dosage form to be used in the manufacture, their amounts on a per batch basis, including overages, and reference to their quality standards.

resource.name: Drug Product Batch Formula Ingredient
resource.description: The amount details about the drug product ingredients in the batch. Use for Batch Formula.

resource.name: Drug Product Component
resource.description: The amount details about the drug product components to define the product composition in a product unit. Use composition.

resource.name: Drug Product Component Function Category Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to drug product component function categories in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Drug Product Description
resource.description: Includes the properties of the drug product and components. Profile of Drug Product profile.

resource.name: Drug Product Handle
resource.description: Includes the essential identifying information of the drug product required to link to other profiles about the product in the eCTD structure. Profile on MedicinalProductDefinition.

resource.name: Drug Product Impurities
resource.description: List of drug product impurities. Profile of Drug Product profile.

resource.name: Drug Route Of Administration Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used for representation of the information on pharmaceutical product route of administration in the framework of the Structured Product Labeling documents.

resource.name: Drug Substance
resource.description: Drug Substance (Active Ingredient) nomenclature and characterization.

resource.name: Drug Substance Handle
resource.description: Includes the essential identifying information of the drug substance required to link to other profiles about the substance in the eCTD structure. Profile on SubstanceDefinition.

resource.name: Drug Substance Impurity
resource.description: Any component of the drug substance that is not the chemical entity for product composition.

resource.name: eCTD Batch Formula
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Product Batch Formula to be included under the eCTD. References Sponsor Organization and Batch Formula

resource.name: eCTD Product Characterisation of Impurities
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Product Characterisation of Impurities in a EctdComposition32P55 to be included under the eCTD. References Sponsor Organization and Product Characterisation of Impurities

resource.name: eCTD Product Description and Composition
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Product Description, Container Closure and Composition of the Drug Product to be included under the 3.2.P.1 heading of the eCTD. References Sponsor Organization, Drug Product Description, and Product Container Closure System.

resource.name: eCTD sections Terminology
resource.description: Value set of all codes in Code system PQCMC Comp Section Types.

resource.name: eCTD Specification
resource.description: The fields needed to represent Quality Specifications for APIs, Drug Substances, Excipients and Raw Materials.

resource.name: eCTD Substance Characterisation
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Substance Structure and Impurities to be included under the 3.2.S.3 heading of the eCTD. References Sponsor Organization, Drug Substance Structure, and Drug Substance Impurities

resource.name: eCTD Substance Control of Materials
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Substance Control of Materials to be included under the eCTD 3.2.S.2.3 heading. References Sponsor Organization and Drug Substance Materials.

resource.name: eCTD Substance General Information
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Substance Nomenclature and Structure to be included under the 3.2.S.1 heading of the eCTD. References Sponsor Organization.

resource.name: Excipient Drug Substance
resource.description: Provides sufficient information to identify an inactive substance and raw materials and its source when stability data is required in the submission.

resource.name: Excipient Function Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to excipient functions in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: GENC and ISO 3166 Intersection
resource.description: The 3 letter country codes used in GENC and ISO have significant overlap: only the country codes in ISO 3166 that have an equivalent code in GENC may be used

resource.name: Graphic Reference
resource.description: A Document Reference to any attachment that contains a graphical representation

resource.name: Graphical File Types
resource.description: The acceptable file types that can be used in graphical files

resource.name: Hierarchical Level
resource.description: Numeric level in the hierarchical value-set. As an example, this extension is used to distinguish between Test Category | Test Subcategory in Quality Specifications. Test Category is level 1 and Test Subcategory is level two. A constraint enforces values greater than zero.

resource.name: Impurity Classification Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to impurity classifications in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Ingredient Location Terminology
resource.description: A category of terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to the location of an ingredient within a product in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Literal Coded Reference
resource.description: An abstract profile to ensure the reference portion of a codeable reference is used, and that the reference is a literal reference to some resource in a bundle

resource.name: Literal Reference
resource.description: An abstract profile to ensure the reference is always a literal reference. Used in conjunction with a rule set to ensure every reference is also bundled.

resource.name: Manufactured Dose Form Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to the manufactured dose form.

resource.name: Manufactured Drug Product
resource.description: The manufactured drug product defined by all its parts or layers. If the drug product composition is homogeneous it will have a single part or component.

resource.name: Non-Percentage Units
resource.description: Units of Measure terminologies that do not represent percentages

resource.name: Organization-Site Identifier Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to the sponsor or testing site unique identifier types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Overage Extension
resource.description: Extension for measurements related to excess for ingredients in the batch formula.

resource.name: Percentage Units
resource.description: Units of Measure terminologies that represent the concept of a percentage

resource.name: Pharmaceutical Dosage Form Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used for representation of the information on pharmaceutical product dosage form in the framework of the SPL documents.

resource.name: Polymorphic Form
resource.description: Alternate structure present in the drug substance

resource.name: PQ-CMC-FDA NCIt Hierarchy Supplement
resource.description: Provides hierarchical relationships for value sets as a CodeSystem supplement to the NCI Thesaurus (NCIt)

resource.name: PqAddress
resource.description: pq-specific Constraints on the Address datatype dealing with US addresses.

resource.name: PQCMC Attachment
resource.description: Any attached file in a submission is required to have a type, data, and a title

resource.name: PQCMC Name Part Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to Name Part data in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Product Batch Strength Textual Extension
resource.description: Extension for strength as a string for ingredients in the batch formula.

resource.name: Product Name Types Terminology
resource.description: The type of the product name. Often the proprietary name is unknown at the time of submission.

resource.name: Product Part Type Terminology
resource.description: A category of terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to the product part type in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Quality Benchmark Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to quality benchmarks in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Quality Specification
resource.description: A quality specification is for a drug product or drug substance (excipient, API or raw material).

resource.name: Release Mechanism Terminology
resource.description: A category of terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to release mechanism in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Release Profile Terminology
resource.description: A category of terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to release profile in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Representation Types
resource.description: The different types of representations (graphical, structure/file and structure/text)

resource.name: SDF File in a Structure Reference
resource.description: A sample SDF file that can be referenced from the bundle profiles

resource.name: Source Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to source types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Specification Section Type Terminology
resource.description: Local value set of all codes in Specification Type codes

resource.name: Specification Status
resource.description: A classification of the regulatory status of the specification.

resource.name: Specification Status Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to specification statuses in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Specification Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to specification types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Strength Extension
resource.description: Strength Type (for API)

resource.name: Strength Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to strength types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Structure Data
resource.description: Any attached file that contains structure data (e.g. SDFiles, MolFiles, INCHI)

resource.name: Structure Data Reference
resource.description: A Document Reference to any attachment that contains structure data

resource.name: Structure Data Types
resource.description: The acceptable file types that can be used in Structure Data Files (MOL,SDF,INCHI,etc)

resource.name: Substance Classification
resource.description: Substance classes

resource.name: Substance General Information
resource.description: Substance General Information containing Drug Substance (Active Ingredient) nomenclature (3.2.S.1.1) and Substance Structure (3.2.S.1.2) profile.

resource.name: Substance Name Type
resource.description: A category of terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to the type of substance name in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Target Range
resource.description: The FHIR Range datatype uses Simple Quantities to represent the high and low bounds, which do not allow a comparator to be set. This extension allows the high and low bounds to have a comparator

resource.name: Test Category Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to test categories in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Test Method Origin Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to test method origins in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Test Usage Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to test usage in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Text Only Codeable Concept
resource.description: An abstract profile for the common scenario where only the text field is used and is required. Doesn't stop the coding portion from being used but it will not be parsed

resource.name: Units Of Measure
resource.description:
Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to units of measure in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.
Note: Includes SPL Unit of Presentation Terminology

page.title: Description and Composition of the Drug Product (3.2.P.1)
page.name: eCTD32P10.html
